body: Cool findings, I think we should summon @lightforever :)
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.

could you please join our slack to ping our team on this issue? 😂 
https://join.slack.com/t/catalyst-team-core/shared_invite/zt-d9miirnn-z86oKDzFMKlMG4fgFdZafw

long story short, easy solution would be to add
```python
        if self.resume is not None:
            self._load_runner(runner, mapping=self.resume, load_full=True)
            # to continue training
            runner.epoch += 1
            runner.global_epoch += 1
            self.resume = None
```
here - https://github.com/catalyst-team/catalyst/blob/master/catalyst/core/callbacks/checkpoint.py#L540

Would you like to make a PR with a hotfix?

I don't think this bot is helpful

from my perspective - it's super helpful, because it tracks this issue :)
could you please check current master version?
we have a fix recently https://github.com/catalyst-team/catalyst#minimal-examples
```python
pip install git+https://github.com/catalyst-team/catalyst@master --upgrade
```

Same issue in my example notebook when replacing catalyst with the git version.
```
filename=catalyst-20.8.3-cp36-none-any.whl size=481981 sha256=d8beee06abb5b177095582eead0288f93917517e8524eb1872f871d71e7fa703
```
